properties.name: Debug - True / False: If True the Workflow will not be deleted

column_data.ActivityJSON: {"id": "","title": "Find String","properties":{ "continue_on_failure": false,"display_name": "Find String","skip_execution": false,"source": "This is a test","searched_string": "test"}}

{"id":"","title":"Match Regular Expression","properties":{"continue_on_failure":false,"display_name":"Match Regular Expression","skip_execution":false,"input_regex":"abc(bc)*","input_string":"This is a test. I will try abc and abcbc will work but abbc won't be."}}

{"id":"","title":"XPath Query","properties":{"continue_on_failure":false,"display_name":"XPath Query","skip_execution":false,"input_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bookstore>
  <book>
    <title lang="en">Harry Potter</title>
    <price>29.99</price>
  </book>
  <book>
    <title lang="en">Learning XML</title>
    <price>39.95</price>
  </book>
</bookstore>","xpath_queries":[{"xpath_query_type":"string","xpath_query":"//book","xpath_query_name":"book"}]}}

{"id":"","title":"XSL Transform","properties":{"continue_on_failure":false,"display_name":"XSL Transform","skip_execution":false,"document":"<?xml version="1.0"?>
<?xml-stylesheet type="text/xsl" href="example.xsl"?>
<Article>
  <Title>My Article</Title>
  <Authors>
    <Author>Mr. Foo</Author>
    <Author>Mr. Bar</Author>
  </Authors>
  <Body>This is my article text.</Body>
</Article>","stylesheet":"<?xml version="1.0"?>
<xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform">

  <xsl:output method="text"/>

  <xsl:template match="/">
    Article - <xsl:value-of select="/Article/Title"/>
    Authors: <xsl:apply-templates select="/Article/Authors/Author"/>
  </xsl:template>

  <xsl:template match="Author">
    - <xsl:value-of select="." />
  </xsl:template>

</xsl:stylesheet>"}}
